metadata.title: CVE-2022-24723 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: URI.js is a Javascript URL mutation library. Before version 1.19.9,whitespace characters are not removed from the beginning of the protocol,so URLs are not parsed properly. This issue has been patched in version1.19.9. Removing leading whitespace from values before passing them toURI.parse can be used as a workaround.

criterions.comment: node-uri-js package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
